idea-plugin.name: Obsidian
idea-plugin.description: A minimalist dark and light theme using comfortable UI colors.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
3.0.0
  • Fully support for 2019.3.x version.
  • Changed some syntax colors.

2.1.1
  • Keyword is no longer bold in obsidian theme.
  • Syntax color changes in obsidian bright.

2.1
  • Update editor tab colors for IntelliJ 2019.2 compatibility.
  • Minor syntax color changes.

2.0
  • Added a completely new theme based on Solarized Light.
  • Changed some syntax color.
  • Borders now are more subtle.

1.4
  • Minor syntax color changes.

1.3
  • Changed syntax color for keyword, now is bold.
  • Changed background color for Version Control Branches.

1.2
  • Added attribute color for HTML and XML files.
  • Added information hint pop-up background.

1.1
  • Added background color for documentation pop-up.
  • Minor color changes.

1.0
  • First release, basic functionality including syntax highlighting and UI environment.
